meaningMnemonic: To <kanji>tranquilize</kanji> <kanji>soul</kanji>s you have to a have a mass <vocabulary>repose of souls</vocabulary>. Then their souls will move on to the next life and stop hanging around here, haunting umbrellas.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
